hero.message: Deecido helps you find the best Recruitment Professionals
hero.description: With the right competencies, references and price

landingsection_01.description: The process can be described in 4 quick steps

landingsection_02.message: Here is what You will get when using Deecido

info_01.description: Tell us what you need and receive up to 3 relevant offers

info_02.description: Compare quotes based on price, competencies, geography, and ratings

info_03.description: Get Deecido standard terms build in to you contract with your new Recruitment Partner

info_04.description: After the assignment is finalized, you give the Recruitment feedback on the performance and you get valueable insights from the candidates

info_05.message: A transparrent Recruitment Business, where the best and most professional Recruitment Partners will get the credit they deserve

info_06.message: An overview of the best recruitment partners in every business area, geography, price range i.e.

info_07.message: Deecido standard terms, which will save you lots of time. All Recruitment partners will always as a minimum match the Deecido terms when comes to guerantee, payment, exclusivity i.e.

info_09.message: Certified in relevant psycometric test tool

info_11.description: Minimum 6 months guarantee on the recruitment

info_12.description: The same standard terms regardless which Recruitment Partner you choose

info_13.description: Payment in 3 installments with 1/3 upfront, 1/3 at Candidate presentation and 1/3 on delivery

info_14.description: Full transparency of the Recruitment Market and which Consultants who perform best

info_15.description: A Recruitment Partner who will go the extra mile in order to get a successful client and a good rating
